Once you’ve completed your online application, [email the British Embassy Zagreb](https://www.gov.uk/world/organisations/british-embassy-zagreb) if you would like your documents collected by someone. Include: *the full name of the person collecting your documents *the date of birth of the person collecting your documents *your application reference number – this will be in your confirmation email
The British Embassy Zagreb will tell you when your documents have been issued and are ready to collect. The person collecting them will need to bring either a Croatian ID card issued by the police or Croatian passport, or a UK passport.

You can swear an affirmation that you’re free to get married in front of a [local notary public](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/find-a-notary-abroad).
You can apply for a no trace letter from the [General Register Office](https://www.gov.uk/general-register-office).
